bib: Toivanen, Hanna-Riitta. “Fortresses and Ecclesiae on the Imperial Frontier of Byzantium: The Architectural Influence of Constantinople on Resafa-Sergiopolis and Zenobia in Syria.” In Jebel Bishri in Context: Introduction to the Archaeological Studies and the Neighbourhood of Jebel Bishri in Central Syria.
